Package com.testnepal.listeners

Class ListenersClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.testnepal.listeners.ListenersClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.testng.ISuiteListener, org.testng.ITestListener, org.testng.ITestNGListener
    public class ListenersClass
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.testng.ITestListener, org.testng.ISuiteListener
    Implements ITestListener and ISuiteListener to leverage the abstract methods Mostly used to help in extent report generation 
    Please make sure to add the listener details in the testng.xml file

    23-Jan-2021

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MD SADAB SAQIB
